metadata.synopsis: Player clicks on the skeleton that locked himself in the heavy safe in Tollhouse. This was am employee of Tollhouse and this way he hoped to wait out the fallout of Shadowcurse. But have died in that safe in dramatic way.
metadata.how_to_trigger: -83; 28; -66read the note on the wall (Need pass DC 18 perception check)Open the safe doorClick on Skeleton

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A forgotten soul, trapped in a safe - but who put them there, and why?*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The skeletal remains of the hopeful survivor still waiting to be rescued, their desperate refuge now their everlasting tomb.*
